snippet.title: SNES Longplay [528] Lethal Weapon
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: xRavenXP

This is the longplay of Lethal Weapon game for SNES and released in conjunction with the third film in the franchise. It is a game based on the third film in the saga Lethal Weapon and is styled side-scrolling. In the game you control Riggs or Murtaugh and everything is very basic, the controls are slippery, the bullets are limited, it is dangerous falls over and the graphics do not impress at all, only the positive point is the music. A weak game with nothing special! -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
